# Gamma UI

> Beautifully designed landing page components built with React & Tailwind CSS.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [Live Waveform](https://gammaui.design/docs/components/live-waveform): A customizable live audio waveform visualizer using the Web Audio API.
- [Support Box](https://gammaui.design/docs/components/support-box): A collapsible animated support widget for quick help actions using Framer Motion.

## Examples

- [Live Waveform Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/live-waveform-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Support Box Demo](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui/blob/main/example/support-box-demo.tsx): Example usage

## Optional

- [Repository](https://github.com/gammauidesign/gammaui): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://gammaui.design/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
